it.escape.core.client.view.gui

Class SmartSwingView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • it.escape.core.client.view.gui.DumbSwingView
                • it.escape.core.client.view.gui.SmartSwingView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DisconnectedCallbackInterface, UpdaterSwingToViewInterface, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class SmartSwingView
extends DumbSwingView
implements UpdaterSwingToViewInterface, java.util.Observer, DisconnectedCallbackInterface
    This is the only subclass of DumbSwingView; This class carries on all the 'active' duties: 1) Biding the view to the updater 2) Observing the model 3) Providing an interface for the Updater to manipulate the view's appearance 4) Reacting to changes in the model's data This is the 'real' SwingView class, an external caller would want to instantiate *this*
    Author:
    michele, andrea
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
